subject: Re: Hi New to the Group and to Franks Box
author: Lance Oliver
full_text:
Hi Cyn,

I defer to Frank since he is the originator of the Frank's Box.

However, this area of research stems from the principles layed out in 
Instramental Trans-Communication. For basic to advanced info on ITC, 
check out www.worlditc.org. 

Lance

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Cyn" <paranormal.detective@...> wrote:
>
> 
> My name is Cyn. I'm very interested in the box and how it works.  I'm
> going to attempt to make one myself, though I have to admit...I'm not
> real sure I'm going to be able to remember all I learned in 
industrial
> arts class 22 years ago. LOL.
> 
> I've been lurking a few days and I've noticed there's a debate going 
on.
> Is debate the right word? Anyway I'm wanting to find out, for 
myself, if
> the box works.
> 
> Any tips?
>
